title: Greek art-changes in representation of female form

content.question: The work on the left is Archaic. The work on the right is late Classical. The two works exemplify changes in the representation of the female form in ancient Greek art.Using specific evidence from both works, compare and contrast the two works to analyze both how and why changes occurred in the representation of the female form in ancient Greek art.

frqParts.text: The work on the left is Archaic. The work on the right is late Classical. The two works exemplify changes in the representation of the female form in ancient Greek art.Using specific evidence from both works, compare and contrast the two works to analyze both how and why changes occurred in the representation of the female form in ancient Greek art.

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
